metadata.name: Suspicious Chromium Browser Instance Executed With Custom Extension
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious process spawning a Chromium based browser process with the 'load-extension' flag to start an instance with a custom extension

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vivaldi.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--load-extension=')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious process spawning a Chromium based browser process with the 'load-extension' flag to start an instance with a custom extension

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: https://redcanary.com/blog/chromeloader/, https://emkc.org/s/RJjuLa, https://www.mandiant.com/resources/blog/lnk-between-browsers
